card.name: CW - CCW363 - Inoxico Incorrect images via API

data.text:
@neilbosworth @gillianoberholzer 

We have performed the search for each of the supplied Reg Numbers.
We took the "Piped" value (Fax ID) and passed that into the call for images
We received the images list
We checked the images and they are ALL correct for each Reg Number.


Info Needed for further Investigation:

We need Inoxico to Supply :

1. The "Piped" Value being returned from the API for each Reg Number.
2. The "FAX ID" Value being passed back for each Reg Number to get the images
3. The Image Paths being returned for each Reg Number.


PS - I have been in contact with a Developer by the name of Addworks a while back to help him fix why their images were not pulling back. His issue was that he was stripping off the piped value  (0 or 1) and only passing in the remainding FAXID which was causing their initial image issue. That issue was fixed at that point when he started using the "FULL PIPED FAXID" that we provide.

@cobuspienaar @stefanbar @jakovanrensburg @willemhuman
